name: And You're There, Too
description: And You’re There, Too is an ongoing collaborative experience that asks people around the world to quickly describe the future they dream about for themselves. No two playthroughs will be the same.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 or later, Windows 10 Processor: Intel i5-4590, AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or better Storage: 2017 MB available space
